html:
Donâ€™t let the torbitude and dreamy eyes fool ya. Rosie is a ruthless competitor. She knows what she wants, and she usually gets it.

Take, for instance, last summerâ€™s crisis over her favorite treats, the aptly named Temptations, in tasty chicken flavor.

She wanted more of them than I could provide. To be honest, she wanted them all â€” all of the Tasty Chicken Temptations nationwide.

She threw herself into research, trying to reverse engineer the recipe for Temptations; however, every batch was a little bit off.

Growing frustrated, she encountered an old sailor cat in a downtown Novato bar who told her the story of El RÃ­o de TentaciÃ³n, the River of Temptationâ€¦

According to the legend, hidden somewhere along the banks of the Sacramento River in Northern California were ancient ruins, within which held the Lost Book of Temptation, the book that contained the original recipe for Tasty Chicken Temptations.

Rosie set out to find it!

After three days of searching, during which time she became very hungry, she found the ruinsâ€¦.

The book was well guarded by dogs and other traps, but eventually she found it and uncovered the secret recipe!

Now Rosie makes her own Temptations whenever she wants. ðŸ™‚

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen
